name: openindelphi
description: Opens current file in Delphi IDE

openindelphi.showContextMenu.description: Show context menu item 'Open Current File in Delphi'

openindelphi.showContextMenuOnFileExtens.description: Show context menu only for files with these extensions. Use '*' for all file extensions, empty string '' for files without extension. Example: ['pas', 'dpr', 'dpk', ''] for Delphi files and files without extension

scripts.package: vsce package patch && pwsh -c "code --install-extension (Get-ChildItem openindelphi-*.vsix | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1).Name"
scripts.package-minor: vsce package minor && pwsh -c "code --install-extension (Get-ChildItem openindelphi-*.vsix | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1).Name"
scripts.package-major: vsce package major && pwsh -c "code --install-extension (Get-ChildItem openindelphi-*.vsix | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1).Name"
scripts.release-no-new-version: pwsh -File ./scripts/release.ps1 -versionType patch -SkipVersionBump && pwsh -c "code --install-extension (Get-ChildItem openindelphi-*.vsix | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1).Name"
